steps.name: change branch to UML
steps.run:
git branch uml master
git checkout uml
git fetch
git config --local user.email "41898282+github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"
git config --local user.name "github-actions[bot]"
git pull origin uml --rebase

steps.name: Push the picture
steps.run:
mkdir -p ci_data
cd ci_data
mv ../uml.png .
git add uml.png
git checkout --ours -- uml.png

steps.name: Commit changes
steps.run: git diff-index --quiet HEAD || git commit -m "Add changes" -a
